scripts.test: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.test:headed: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --headed
scripts.test:list: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --reporter=list
scripts.test:html: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --reporter=html
scripts.test:custom: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --reporter=./dist/reports/reporter.js
scripts.test:slow: pnpm run build && set SLOWMO_MS=300&& set HEADLESS=false&& pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.test:fast: pnpm run build && set SLOWMO_MS=0&& set HEADLESS=true&& pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.test:debug: pnpm run build && set PWDEBUG=1&& set HEADLESS=false&& pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.test:chromium: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test:firefox: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.test:webkit: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --project=webkit
